name: weekly-retro
description: Weekly retrospective — review the week's brainstorms, standups, and decisions
task: Run a weekly retrospective. Read all standups from this week (standups/YYYY-MM-DD.md for Mon-Fri). Read any brainstorm syntheses created this week. Read any decisions logged this week. Spawn the COO to produce a 'Week in Review' report covering: (1) What the fleet accomplished, (2) Key decisions made, (3) Unresolved tensions, (4) Recommendations for next week. Save to docs/reports/retro-YYYY-WNN.md and deliver summary to Telegram.
notes: Friday 5 PM default — adjust to your schedule
This is a good time for memory maintenance: update agent MEMORY.md files with the week's learnings
Consider spawning individual agents for their own retrospective before the COO synthesis
